definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= place of terebinths or other great trees, v. Di Ge 14:6 & Ex 15:27 (12 fountains & 70 palms)) 2nd station of Isr. in desert after passing sea Ex 16:1, Ex 16:1, Nu 33:9, Nu 33:10; [[אֵי֫לִמָה]] Ex 15:27, Nu 33:9; prob. = Wady Gharandel cf. Rob:BR i. 100, 105.
